name: Meme Gacha!
description:
The World of Gacha is in danger... APRIL FOOLS!
It's actually in danger from memes!

Enter Meme Gacha and start Gacha'ing for memes today!
There are over 200 memes to collect! Can you collect them all and become the ultimate memelord?!

Each meme is related to our Lunime characters, and there are voices by the Lunime staff!
Check out the Soundboard to hear all the epic phrases!

The game was put together in 3 days to get it out in time for April Fool's Day.
Dive in to the world of memes in Meme Gacha today!!!

Like us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/Lunime
Facebook Group: http://www.facebook.com/groups/Lunime/
Visit our Website: http://www.Lunime.com
